bibl.title: The Rosetta Stone. The Story of the Decoding of Hieroglyphics. Translated by Steven RENDALL.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: La pierre de Rosette = Histoire (Paris, 1999). - La traduction anglaise a paru conjointement aux États-Unis: New York, Four Walls Eight Windows, 2002, 184 pp., figg. ISBN 1-56858-226-9. $23.95.
SOLÉ Robert and Dominique VALBELLE, The Rosetta Stone. The Story of the Decoding of Hieroglyphics. Translated by Steven RENDALL.
